Package io.spine.validate

This package provides validation classes and interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraint
    A validation rule attributed to a message type.
    ConstraintTranslator<T>
    Translates validation constraints into an output form.
    ConstraintViolationOrBuilder  
    CustomConstraint
    A custom runtime constraint defined by a library other than spine-base.
    FieldAwareMessage
    The mixin for Messages which are aware of their fields and are able to provide their values with no reflection used by Protobuf.
    ValidationErrorOrBuilder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alternative
    A combination of required fields found in the message value.
    ComparableNumber
    A number that can be compared to another number.
    Constraints
    Validation constraints of a single Protobuf message type.
    ConstraintViolation
    Describes violation of a validation constraint found in a field of a message.
    ConstraintViolation.Builder
    Describes violation of a validation constraint found in a field of a message.
    ExceptionFactory<E extends java.lang.Exception,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends MessageClass<?>,R extends com.google.protobuf.ProtocolMessageEnum>
    A helper class for building exceptions used to report invalid Messages, which have fields that violate validation constraint(s).
    ExternalConstraintOptions
    Provides option value for a field mentioned in an ExternalMessageConstraint.
    ExternalConstraints
    A collection of external constrains known to the application.
    FieldValue
    A field value to validate.
    MessageValue
    A value of a Message to validate.
    NumberText
    A number that is described with a String of characters.
    Validate
    This class provides general validation routines.
    ValidationError
    An error indicating that a message did not pass validation.
    ValidationError.Builder
    An error indicating that a message did not pass validation.
    ValidationErrorProto  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ValidationException
    An exception that is thrown if a Message does not pass the validation.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NonValidated
    Marks a message which may not be valid.
    Validated
    Marks a message which is guaranteed to be valid.

Package io.spine.validate Description

This package provides validation classes and interfaces.
